directory.name: src
directory.purpose: The `src` directory houses the source code for a temporary React to-do application, including components, custom hooks, type definitions, utility functions, and asset files.

subdirectories.name: assets
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The directory `src\assets` stores the asset files used by a project's source code.

subdirectories.name: components
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: This directory, `src\components`, houses the source code for various components of a to-do application, including input, items, lists, filters, and statistics.

subdirectories.name: hooks
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: This directory, `src\hooks`, contains the source code for custom React hooks used within a temporary project repository.

subdirectories.name: types
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The `src\types` directory stores type definitions for a project's source code.

subdirectories.name: utils
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The `src\utils` directory contains utility functions and supporting code for a temporary project repository.
